timeline.message: Update docker build scripts to use pull flag

timeline.bodyText:
Is this documented somewhere?
Is this URL expected to not change frequently?
timeline.author: hashhar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,8 +17,9 @@ LABEL maintainer="Presto community <https://prestosql.io/community.html>"
 ENV JAVA_HOME /usr/lib/jvm/java-11
 RUN \
     set -xeu && \
+    yum -y -q install https://cdn.azul.com/zulu/bin/zulu-repo-1.0.0-1.noarch.rpm && \

replies.bodyText:
Is this documented somewhere?

It is documented here.

Is this URL expected to not change frequently?

This is definitely a fair question. My assumption would be no because the url is in their documentation. This has been the url since 2020-06-30 as seen in azul's CDN here..
replies.author: meneal
